Easily create nice looking lists, that come in different styles.

Usage

  • Wrap with the .ListContainer class
  • Add the .List class to the unordered list
  • Add the .ListSelectable modifier class to the list to display selections
  • Add the .Even class to <li> elements to display alternating rows
